mapper.sql: select WIN_NO as winningNumber from lott_new_a3d1.LOTT_MANAUL_TEMP
mapper.select: where SORTID in (select group_value from lott_new_a3d1.lott_group_series where param_one = #{arg0} ) and NUMERO = #{arg1}
select count(1) from lott_new_a3d1.LOTT_MANAUL_TEMP where SORTID in (select group_value from lott_new_a3d1.lott_group_series where param_one = #{arg0} ) and NUMERO = #{arg1} and WIN_NO = #{arg2}
